wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Sir James Arthur "Jack" d'Avigdor-Goldsmid, 3rd Baronet,  (19 December 1912 – 6 September 1987) was a British Army officer and British Conservative politician. He was a member of the prominent Anglo-Jewish d'Avigdor-Goldsmid family, and his brother Sir Henry d'Avigdor-Goldsmid, 2nd Baronet was also a Member of Parliament.
